actions.subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the Legal Services Corporation for fiscal years 1982, 1983, and 1984.

summary.text: Amends the Legal Services Corporation Act to authorize appropriations for the activities of the Legal Services Corporation in the amount of $321,300,000 for fiscal year 1982 and necessary sums for fiscal years 1983 and 1984.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the Legal Services Corporation for fiscal years 1982, 1983, and 1984.
